name: Software Developer
description: Design, develop, and maintain software applications for various platforms including web, mobile, and desktop. Work with programming languages, frameworks, and tools to create efficient and scalable solutions.

career_progression.Entry: Junior Developer - Learn coding practices, fix bugs, implement basic features
career_progression.Mid: Software Engineer - Design features, mentor juniors, lead small projects
career_progression.Senior: Senior/Lead Engineer - Architecture decisions, lead teams, strategic planning

name: Web Developer
description: Create and maintain websites and web applications using modern technologies. Work on both frontend and backend development, ensuring responsive design and optimal user experience.

career_progression.Entry: Junior Web Developer - Build pages, implement designs, fix bugs
career_progression.Mid: Web Developer - Full-stack development, lead features
career_progression.Senior: Senior Web Developer - Architecture, performance optimization, mentoring

name: Data Scientist
description: Analyze complex data sets to help organizations make data-driven decisions. Use statistical methods, machine learning algorithms, and data visualization to extract meaningful insights.

career_progression.Entry: Data Analyst - Clean data, create reports, basic analysis
career_progression.Mid: Data Scientist - Build ML models, advanced analytics, insights
career_progression.Senior: Lead Data Scientist - Strategy, mentor team, data initiatives

name: Mobile App Developer
description: Develop applications for mobile devices including iOS and Android platforms. Create user-friendly interfaces and ensure optimal performance across different devices.

career_progression.Entry: Junior Mobile Developer - Implement features, fix bugs, learn platform specifics
career_progression.Mid: Mobile Developer - Lead app development, optimize performance
career_progression.Senior: Senior Mobile Developer - Architecture decisions, cross-platform solutions

name: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Protect organizations from digital threats by implementing security measures, monitoring systems, and responding to security incidents.

career_progression.Entry: Security Analyst - Monitor systems, basic threat detection
career_progression.Mid: Cybersecurity Analyst - Implement security measures, incident response
career_progression.Senior: Senior Security Analyst - Security strategy, lead security team

name: Database Administrator
description: Manage and maintain database systems, ensuring data integrity, security, and optimal performance. Design database structures and optimize queries.

career_progression.Entry: Junior DBA - Basic maintenance, query optimization
career_progression.Mid: Database Administrator - System design, advanced optimization
career_progression.Senior: Senior DBA - Architecture, disaster recovery planning

name: DevOps Engineer
description: Bridge the gap between development and operations teams by automating deployment processes, managing infrastructure, and ensuring reliable software delivery.

career_progression.Entry: DevOps Engineer - Automate basic processes, deployment
career_progression.Mid: Senior DevOps Engineer - Infrastructure design, monitoring
career_progression.Senior: DevOps Lead - Strategy, team leadership, architecture

name: AI/ML Engineer
description: Design and implement artificial intelligence and machine learning systems. Work on developing algorithms, training models, and deploying AI solutions.
short_description: Build AI and machine learning systems.

career_progression.Entry: ML Engineer - Implement models, data preprocessing
career_progression.Mid: AI/ML Engineer - Design systems, optimize models
career_progression.Senior: Senior AI Engineer - Research, lead AI initiatives

name: UI/UX Designer
description: Design user interfaces and enhance user experience for digital products. Conduct user research, create wireframes, and ensure intuitive design solutions.

career_progression.Entry: Junior Designer - Create mockups, assist research
career_progression.Mid: UI/UX Designer - Lead design projects, user research
career_progression.Senior: Lead Designer - Design strategy, mentor team

name: Business Analyst
description: Analyze business needs and translate them into technical requirements. Bridge communication between business stakeholders and technical teams.

career_progression.Entry: Business Analyst - Gather requirements, create documentation
career_progression.Mid: Senior Business Analyst - Lead projects, stakeholder management
career_progression.Senior: Business Analysis Manager - Strategy, team leadership

name: Research Scientist
description: Conduct scientific research and experiments in various fields including physics, chemistry, biology, and computer science. Publish findings and advance knowledge.

career_progression.Entry: Research Assistant - Conduct experiments, data collection
career_progression.Mid: Research Scientist - Lead research projects, publish papers
career_progression.Senior: Principal Scientist - Research strategy, team leadership

name: Civil Engineer
description: Design, plan, and supervise construction projects including roads, bridges, buildings, and infrastructure. Ensure safety and compliance with regulations.

career_progression.Entry: Junior Engineer - Design calculations, site inspections
career_progression.Mid: Civil Engineer - Lead projects, client management
career_progression.Senior: Senior Civil Engineer - Complex projects, team leadership

name: Doctor
description: Diagnose and treat medical conditions, provide preventive care, and promote overall health and wellness for patients across all age groups.

career_progression.Entry: Resident Doctor - Clinical training, supervised practice
career_progression.Mid: Attending Physician - Independent practice, specialization
career_progression.Senior: Chief of Department - Leadership, medical direction

name: Nurse
description: Provide comprehensive patient care in various healthcare settings. Administer medications, monitor patient conditions, and support recovery processes.

career_progression.Entry: Staff Nurse - Basic patient care, learn procedures
career_progression.Mid: Registered Nurse - Specialized care, leadership
career_progression.Senior: Nurse Manager - Team supervision, quality improvement

name: Pharmacist
description: Dispense medications, counsel patients on proper usage, and ensure safe and effective drug therapy. Manage pharmacy operations and inventory.

career_progression.Entry: Staff Pharmacist - Dispensing, basic counseling
career_progression.Mid: Clinical Pharmacist - Patient care, drug therapy management
career_progression.Senior: Pharmacy Manager - Operations, team leadership

name: Marketing Manager
description: Develop and execute marketing strategies to promote products and services. Manage campaigns, analyze market trends, and drive brand growth.

career_progression.Entry: Marketing Coordinator - Campaign execution, market research
career_progression.Mid: Marketing Manager - Strategy development, team management
career_progression.Senior: Senior Marketing Manager - Brand strategy, cross-functional leadership

name: Financial Analyst
description: Analyze financial data to help organizations make investment decisions. Prepare reports, forecast trends, and evaluate financial performance.

career_progression.Entry: Junior Analyst - Data collection, basic analysis
career_progression.Mid: Financial Analyst - Complex modeling, investment recommendations
career_progression.Senior: Senior Financial Analyst - Strategy, portfolio management

name: Teacher/Educator
description: Educate and inspire students at various levels. Develop curriculum, assess learning, and create engaging learning environments.

career_progression.Entry: Teacher - Classroom instruction, lesson planning
career_progression.Mid: Senior Teacher - Curriculum development, mentoring
career_progression.Senior: Department Head - Leadership, educational strategy

name: Graphic Designer
description: Create visual content for print and digital media. Design logos, websites, advertisements, and marketing materials using creative software tools.

career_progression.Entry: Junior Designer - Basic designs, assist projects
career_progression.Mid: Graphic Designer - Lead projects, client management
career_progression.Senior: Senior Designer - Creative direction, team leadership

name: Project Manager
description: Plan, execute, and oversee projects from initiation to completion. Coordinate teams, manage resources, and ensure project success within budget and timeline.

career_progression.Entry: Project Coordinator - Support project execution
career_progression.Mid: Project Manager - Lead projects, stakeholder management
career_progression.Senior: Senior Project Manager - Complex projects, program management
